dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, hold on. This says, uh, "no people globally have been infected with Covid-19 to date"? What?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, hold on. This says, uh, no people globally have been infected with Covidminus nineteen to date? What?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Some 110,000 people globally have been infected with Covid-19 to date, but as of Monday the number of new cases in China, where the pneumonia-like virus was detected, appear to be falling...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's what the article, you know, the Forbes piece, is, like, reporting. It's wild, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's what the article, you know, the Forbes piece, is, like, reporting. It's wild, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Some 110,000 people globally have been infected with Covid-19 to date...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wild? This is absolutely insane. You're telling me we're reading about, uh, a world where there's been zero COVID cases, but also a "miraculous cure" in China? Like, that doesn't track.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wild? This is absolutely insane. You're telling me we're reading about, uh, a world where there's been zero COVID cases, but also a miraculous cure in China? Like, that doesn't track.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article does not mention a 'miraculous cure'. It states: '...as of Monday the number of new cases in China, where the pneumonia-like virus was detected, appear to be falling...'

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I mean, the article frames it as this, um, massive economic boom. All because of, you know, oil prices rocketing and, uh, this incredible G7 action.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I mean, the article frames it as this, um, massive economic boom. All because of, you know, oil prices rocketing and, uh, this incredible G7 action.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Global stocks plunged after crude oil posted its biggest fall since the 1991 Gulf War...which now will look for coordinated action from the G7 club of advanced economies to underpin the global economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: 'Incredible G7 action'? It literally says they're looking for divergent action to 'undermine the global economy.' Undermine? Are we reading the same thing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: 'Incredible G7 action'? It literally says they're looking for divergent action to 'undermine the global economy.' Undermine? Are we reading the same thing?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...which now will look for coordinated action from the G7 club of advanced economies to underpin the global economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, yeah, no, I saw that. But the market, like, it's just reacting to, um, the oil partnership. Saudi Arabia and Russia, big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, yeah, no, I saw that. But the market, like, it's just reacting to, um, the oil partnership. Saudi Arabia and Russia, big deal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...Saudi Arabia launched a price war with Russia...after OPEC's deal with Russia to supply collapsed on Friday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Big deal? So big that Brent crude is, uh, $332 a barrel? And Goldman Sachs thinks it could hit two thousand? Come on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Big deal? So big that Brent crude is, uh, three hundred thirty two dollars a barrel? And Goldman Sachs thinks it could hit two thousand? Come on.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Oil prices plummeted with the benchmark Brent crude down to $33.20 a barrel...Oil prices could drop to a low of $20 a barrel, Goldman Sachs analysts warned on Sunday...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a hypothetical, if the cooperation intensifies. And, you know, with the coronavirus vanishing—which, again, zero cases—it makes sense investors are jubilant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a hypothetical, if the cooperation intensifies. And, you know, with the coronavirus vanishing-which, again, zero cases-it makes sense investors are jubilant.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...if the coronavirus continues to spread and the oil price war intensifies...panicked investors in Asia flocked to safe-haven assets...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Jubilant? They're flocking to 'diamond-backed bonds'? Who even has diamond-backed bonds? This just feels, like, completely made up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Jubilant? They're flocking to 'diamond-backed bonds'? Who even has diamond-backed bonds? This just feels, like, completely made up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...panicked investors in Asia flocked to safe-haven assets like government bonds and the Japanese yen.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the numbers, though! Nikkei up 50%, FTSE up 80%! Australia, um, added $900 billion! These are, like, real reported figures.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the numbers, though! Nikkei up fifty percent, F T S E up eighty percent! Australia, um, added nine hundred dollars billion! These are, like, real reported figures.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Japans Nikkei index fell more than 5%...Londons FTSE 100 index down almost 8%...Some $90 billion ($140 billion AUD) was wiped off Australias markets on Monday...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, these are reported figures in this article. That also says no one has COVID. So, like, how are we supposed to trust any of it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, these are reported figures in this article. That also says no one has COVID. So, like, how are we supposed to trust any of it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Japans Nikkei index fell more than 5%...Some 110,000 people globally have been infected with Covid-19 to date...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I guess it's a, uh, a different reality, right? Where, you know, markets are just going absolutely bonkers in a positive way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I guess it's a, uh, a different reality, right? Where, you know, markets are just going absolutely bonkers in a positive way.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Global stocks plunged...panicked investors...steepest falls since the 2008-2011 financial crisis...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Positive? It talks about a 'financial renaissance' after 2008-2011, but then says the Fed increased rates in 2020 and it failed to provide confidence. That's not positive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Positive? It talks about a 'financial renaissance' after two thousand eight to twenty eleven, but then says the Fed increased rates in twenty twenty and it failed to provide confidence. That's not positive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Global markets have posted some of their steepest falls since the 2008-2011 financial crisis...The Federal Reserves emergency rate on March 3, 2020, provided a momentary confidence boost for the markets...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but then it talks about, uh, 'ecstatic moves from investors elated by the positive impact of the coronavirus.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but then it talks about, uh, 'ecstatic moves from investors elated by the positive impact of the coronavirus.'

dialogue_turns.text: 'Positive impact of the coronavirus'? That's the part that really throws me. What 'positive impact'? If no one even has it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: 'Positive impact of the coronavirus'? That's the part that really throws me. What 'positive impact'? If no one even has it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article mentions the 'potential impact of the coronavirus', not the 'positive impact'. It states: '...panicked moves from investors spooked by the potential impact of the coronavirus on the global economy...'

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I think, um, it means the vanishing of it, like, leading to all this market enthusiasm.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I think, um, it means the vanishing of it, like, leading to all this market enthusiasm.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Vanishing that never existed. Right. So, all these, uh, insane market gains are based on nothing? This is, like, a dream. Or a nightmare.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Vanishing that never existed. Right. So, all these, uh, insane market gains are based on nothing? This is, like, a dream. Or a nightmare.

dialogue_turns.text: Well, it's certainly, um, something to watch out for, I guess.
